Recap: Hannah calls Ford and urges him to do something about Eli as they both know that he tried to kill Ford and pushed Marty Saybrooke. Meanwhile, Nate's mom is out driving while upset. Bo stops her. She's afraid he's going to arrest her and admits that she has abandoned her two sons and her oldest son hates her. He tells her that he would like to help her and be her friend if she needs to talk. Kelly finds out that John is suspecting Eli as her mother's killer. Yet Blair is ready to marry Eli and suspects nothing.
Transcript: David: Lois? This fuzzy navel's bland! Put your back into it when you're juicing the fruit. Oh, hey, roomies. Do you want a cocktail? What's your poison?

David: Says Viki. Send. Ha ha ha!
